attributes.additional_details: Empty shelves for basis day to day household items, food and medicines. I just met a father who couldn't even get Calpol for his I'll baby anywhere...this is absolute madness in a modern world...
attributes.background: Ration cards (maybe even electronicly) for basic household items and food (dried food,  tinned food, frozen and eggs), medicin(calpol, ibuprofen, paracetamol) etc to stop people panic buying

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
